alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:11PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT COCONINO COUNTY NEAR TUBA CITY THROUGH 200 PM MST... At 110 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Tuba City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuba City, Moenave, Coalmine Canyon Chapter House, Coalmine Canyon Chapter, Moenkopi, and Hopi. This includes the following highways... State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 346. Highway 160 between mile markers 315 and 330. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
